description: The entire data segregation and security model relies on complex Firestore Security Rules, representing a single point of failure and a critical skill dependency on the Lead Backend Developer.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming for all security rule changes. Implement a comprehensive security rule test suite with >95% coverage.
contingency_plan: Engage an external Firebase security consultant for a full audit before public release.
monitoring_trigger: CI/CD build fails due to security rule test failure.

description: Project success is highly dependent on cross-domain expertise (Flutter, Firebase, TypeScript). The loss or unavailability of the senior backend or senior frontend developer would severely impact the timeline.
mitigation_strategy: Enforce knowledge sharing through mandatory documentation for all complex features. Implement a formal cross-training plan between backend and fullstack developers.
contingency_plan: Maintain a shortlist of pre-vetted contractors for rapid augmentation.
monitoring_trigger: Knowledge transfer sessions are missed for two consecutive sprints.
